name: Wyndstorm
tag_list: wyndstorm, iptv, ott, video, streaming-media, online-tv, media-managment, streaming-video
overview:
Wyndstorm enables rapid creation of new web distribution channels for the delivery of live video/audio streaming, gaming, online entertainment, content sharing, and e-commerce features. We offer social media and streaming content solutions so that our clients can focus on their core business, and not on technology and channel distribution.

Wyndstorm also provides social media marketing, online awareness, and new media marketing services to ensure that our clientsâ€™ streaming media programs are commercially successful.

At Wyndstorm, we believe that the whole is greater than the sum of the individual parts: We are geeks, surfers, writers, technologists, baby-boomers, dot-comers, east-coast-preps, west-coast-cool, creative mavericks and most of all: Social Media Architects.

We apply the latest streaming media technologies and social outreach techniques to help your company generate create new lines of revenue, and reach new audiences by cultivating, managing, and unleashing the power of new web distribution channels.
